title: Add sell button to the interface

requirements.text: Add a 'Sell' button to the main navigation header in the Layout component, positioned alongside the existing Cart and Login buttons
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Sell' button is visible in the header navigation
The button styling matches the existing navigation button pattern
The button is positioned logically within the header layout

requirements.text: Create a new Sell page route and component that allows users to list items for sale, including fields for product name, description, price, category (Paper Squishies or Slime), and image upload capability
acceptanceCriteria: A new route '/sell' is configured in the router
The Sell page includes a form with all required fields
Form validation ensures all required fields are completed
The page follows the existing Dino Squad visual theme

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to accept and store seller product submissions, including product details, seller information (linked to Internet Identity), and approval status
acceptanceCriteria: Backend method accepts product submission data from authenticated users
Submitted products are stored with pending approval status
Seller identity is captured from the authenticated principal
Product submission data includes all form fields from the frontend

requirements.text: Connect the Sell page form to the backend actor to submit new product listings when users click a 'Submit for Approval' button
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission calls the backend actor method
Success confirmation is displayed to the user after submission
Error handling displays appropriate messages if submission fails
Form is cleared after successful submission

constraints: Use the existing Internet Identity authentication system for seller identity
Follow the single-actor backend architecture pattern
Maintain the existing Dino Squad visual theme and color scheme
Use React Query for data fetching and mutations
nonGoals: Adding payment processing for seller payouts
Creating a separate seller dashboard or analytics
Implementing image hosting or CDN integration
